name: Patrick Tarrant

roles_in_work.title: Planet Usher: an interactive home movie

biography: Patrick Tarrant is a Lecturer in "Interactive Writing" at Queensland University of Technology and has recently completed his Masters Project "Planet Usher: An Interactive Home Movie" (CDROM) at RMIT University, Melbourne. Patrick was also the scriptwriter for the award winning CDROM "Scoop" (AIMIA, Melbourne 1998).
